title: Drawing, "Various Sketches: Officer on Horseback, Mules Drawing a Wagon, a Virginia Cabin", ca. 1864
medium: Graphite, brush and slight watercolor wash on paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto; Vertical view of an army wagon drawn by mule and driven by an African-American male.
Verso: Various sketches: officer on horseback, mules drawing a wagon, Virginia cabin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Various Sketches: Officer on Horseback, Mules Drawing a Wagon, a Virginia Cabin", ca. 1864.
ca. 1864. Graphite, brush and slight watercolor wash on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-201.
